titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that net legal wagering gains shall not be included in gross income.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income the net legal wagering gains of a taxpayer who is not engaged in the trade or business of placing wagers. Sets forth the method of calculating net legal wagering gains.
